example_sentence_italian: In sala ci sono quattro sedie.
example_sentence_english: There are four chairs in the room.

example_sentence_italian: Ci servono delle sedie in più.
La gamba della sedia è rotta.
example_sentence_english: The leg of the chair is broken.

example_sentence_italian: Ho legato il cuscino alla sedia.
example_sentence_english: I tied the cushion to the chair.

example_sentence_italian: Ho attaccato i cartellini alle sedie.
example_sentence_english: I attached the tags to the chairs.

example_sentence_italian: Ho tolto i cuscini dalle sedie.
example_sentence_english: I removed the cushions from the chairs.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato un biglietto nella sedia.
example_sentence_english: I found a note in the chair.

example_sentence_italian: Non ci sono documenti nelle sedie.
example_sentence_english: There are no documents in the chairs.
The cat sleeps on the chair.

example_sentence_italian: Ho messo i pacchi sulle sedie.
example_sentence_english: I put the packages on the chairs.

example_sentence_italian: Ho spostato il tavolo con la sedia.
example_sentence_english: I moved the table with the chair.

example_sentence_italian: Ho portato il tavolo con le sedie.
example_sentence_english: I brought the table with the chairs.
